function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for virus transmission in shared toilets","Impact":"Increased risk of infection for residents","Mitigation":"Separate toilets for infected individuals","Technologies":"Separate toilet infrastructure","People":"Residents, especially those in close proximity to infected individuals","Owner":"Building management, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Higher risk of virus transmission through greywater","Impact":"Potential exposure to the virus through water sources","Mitigation":"Separation and disinfection of greywater","Technologies":"Separate piping systems, disinfection technologies","People":"Residents using water sources within the building","Owner":"Building management, sanitation authorities"},{"Description":"Increased energy consumption due to lockdown measures","Impact":"Higher energy use leading to environmental impact and increased costs","Mitigation":"Promote energy-efficient practices, use of efficient appliances","Technologies":"Energy-efficient appliances, monitoring systems","People":"Residents using energy in households","Owner":"Building management, environmental authorities"}]}
